The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his finger tips go white. His wife tells him he should see a doctor about it.... many clues. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to the original fairy tale by the brothers Grimm and the original Disney animation. I think it will be wrong to refer to this movie with any moniker whose prefix is ‘Disney’. It is as much a part of the previous franchise as ‘An Academy Award Winning Film’ is a part
